blocks.name: df-funss
blocks.content: Define the class of all function sets (but not necessarily function relations, cf. ~ df-funsALTV ). It is used only by ~ df-funsALTV . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 17-Jul-2021.)

blocks.name: df-funsALTV
blocks.content: Define the function relations class, i.e., the class of functions. Alternate definitions are ~ dffunsALTV , ... , ~ dffunsALTV5 . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 17-Jul-2021.)

blocks.name: df-funALTV
blocks.content: Define the function relation predicate, i.e., the function predicate. This definition of the function predicate (based on a more general, converse reflexive, relation) and the original definition of function in set.mm ~ df-fun , are always the same, that is ` ( FunALTV F <-> Fun F ) ` , see ~ funALTVfun . The element of the class of functions and the function predicate are the same, that is ` ( F e. FunsALTV <-> FunALTV F ) ` when ` F ` is a set, see ~ elfunsALTVfunALTV . Alternate definitions are ~ dffunALTV2 , ... , ~ dffunALTV5 . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 17-Jul-2021.)

blocks.name: dffunsALTV
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the class of functions. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 18-Jul-2021.)

blocks.name: dffunsALTV2
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the class of functions. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 30-Aug-2021.)

blocks.name: dffunsALTV3
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the class of functions. For the ` X ` axis and the ` Y ` axis you can convert the right side to ` { f e. Rels | A. ` x1 ` A. ` y1 ` A. ` y2 ` ( ( ` x1 ` f ` y1 ` /\ ` x1 ` f ` y2 ` ) -> ` y1 ` = ` y2 ` ) } ` . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 30-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dffunsALTV3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cfunsALTV, crab(s0, crels, wal(s1, wal(s2, wal(s3, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s3))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
} = {
  rabimbieq(s0, cfunsALTV, crels, wal(s1, wal(s2, wal(s3, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s3))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))), wcel(ccoss(cv(s0)), ccnvrefrels))
  dffunsALTV(s0)
  syl6rbbr(wcel(cv(s0), crels), wcel(ccoss(cv(s0)), ccnvrefrels), wal(s1, wal(s2, wal(s3, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s3))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))), wa(wal(s1, wal(s2, wal(s3, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s3))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))), wcel(ccoss(cv(s0)), crels)))
  biantrud(wcel(cv(s0), crels), wal(s1, wal(s2, wal(s3, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s3))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))), wcel(ccoss(cv(s0)), crels))
  cosselrels(cv(s0), crels)
  cosselcnvrefrels3(s1, s2, s3, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dffunsALTV3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ FunsALTV = { s0 ‚àà Rels | ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2, ‚àÄ(s3,((s1[s0]s2 ‚àß s1[s0]s3)‚Üí s2 = s3))))}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
} = {
  rabimbieq(s0, cfunsALTV, crels, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2, ‚àÄ(s3,((s1[s0]s2 ‚àß s1[s0]s3)‚Üí s2 = s3)))), , ~(s0)‚àà CnvRefRels)
  dffunsALTV(s0)
  syl6rbbr(s0 ‚àà Rels, , ~(s0)‚àà CnvRefRels, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2, ‚àÄ(s3,((s1[s0]s2 ‚àß s1[s0]s3)‚Üí s2 = s3)))), (‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2, ‚àÄ(s3,((s1[s0]s2 ‚àß s1[s0]s3)‚Üí s2 = s3))))‚àß, ~(s0)‚àà Rels))
  biantrud(s0 ‚àà Rels, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2, ‚àÄ(s3,((s1[s0]s2 ‚àß s1[s0]s3)‚Üí s2 = s3)))), , ~(s0)‚àà Rels)
  cosselrels(s0, crels)
  cosselcnvrefrels3(s1, s2, s3, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
}

blocks.name: dffunsALTV4
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the class of functions. For the ` X ` axis and the ` Y ` axis you can convert the right side to ` { f e. Rels | A. x1 E* y1 x1 f y1 } ` . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 31-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dffunsALTV4(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2) {
  |- wceq(cfunsALTV, crab(s0, crels, wal(s1, wmo(s2, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  rabimbieq(s0, cfunsALTV, crels, wal(s1, wmo(s2, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(ccoss(cv(s0)), ccnvrefrels))
  dffunsALTV(s0)
  syl6rbbr(wcel(cv(s0), crels), wcel(ccoss(cv(s0)), ccnvrefrels), wal(s1, wmo(s2, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wa(wal(s1, wmo(s2, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(ccoss(cv(s0)), crels)))
  biantrud(wcel(cv(s0), crels), wal(s1, wmo(s2, wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(ccoss(cv(s0)), crels))
  cosselrels(cv(s0), crels)
  cosselcnvrefrels4(s1, s2, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dffunsALTV4(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2) {
  ‚ä¢ FunsALTV = { s0 ‚àà Rels | ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÉ*(s2, s1[s0]s2))}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
} = {
  rabimbieq(s0, cfunsALTV, crels, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÉ*(s2, s1[s0]s2)), , ~(s0)‚àà CnvRefRels)
  dffunsALTV(s0)
  syl6rbbr(s0 ‚àà Rels, , ~(s0)‚àà CnvRefRels, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÉ*(s2, s1[s0]s2)), (‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÉ*(s2, s1[s0]s2))‚àß, ~(s0)‚àà Rels))
  biantrud(s0 ‚àà Rels, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÉ*(s2, s1[s0]s2)), , ~(s0)‚àà Rels)
  cosselrels(s0, crels)
  cosselcnvrefrels4(s1, s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

blocks.name: dffunsALTV5
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the class of functions. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 31-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dffunsALTV5(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2) {
  |- wceq(cfunsALTV, crab(s0, crels, wral(s1, crn(cv(s0)), wral(s2, crn(cv(s0)), wo(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(cin(cec(cv(s1), ccnv(cv(s0))), cec(cv(s2), ccnv(cv(s0)))), emptycls))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  eqtr4i(cfunsALTV, crab(s0, crels, wral(s1, crn(cv(s0)), wral(s2, crn(cv(s0)), wo(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(cin(cec(cv(s1), ccnv(cv(s0))), cec(cv(s2), ccnv(cv(s0)))), emptycls))))), crab(s0, crels, wal(hs0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(hs0), cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  dffunsALTV4(s0, hs0, s1)
  rabbii(s0, crels, wral(s1, crn(cv(s0)), wral(s2, crn(cv(s0)), wo(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(cin(cec(cv(s1), ccnv(cv(s0))), cec(cv(s2), ccnv(cv(s0)))), emptycls)))), wal(hs0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(hs0), cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  ineccnvmo2(s1, s2, hs0, cv(s0))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dffunsALTV5(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2) {
  ‚ä¢ FunsALTV = { s0 ‚àà Rels | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(s0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(s0),(s1 = s2 ‚à®([s1]`' s0 ‚ãÇ[s2]`' s0)= ‚àÖ)))}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
} = {
  eqtr4i(cfunsALTV, { s0 ‚àà Rels | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(s0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(s0),(s1 = s2 ‚à®([s1]`' s0 ‚ãÇ[s2]`' s0)= ‚àÖ)))}, { s0 ‚àà Rels | ‚àÄ(hs0, ‚àÉ*(s1, hs0[s0]s1))})
  dffunsALTV4(s0, hs0, s1)
  rabbii(s0, crels, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(s0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(s0),(s1 = s2 ‚à®([s1]`' s0 ‚ãÇ[s2]`' s0)= ‚àÖ))), ‚àÄ(hs0, ‚àÉ*(s1, hs0[s0]s1)))
  ineccnvmo2(s1, s2, hs0, s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
}

blocks.name: dffunALTV2

blocks.name: dffunALTV3
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the function relation predicate, cf. ~ dfdisjALTV3 . Reproduction of ~ dffun2 . For the ` X ` axis and the ` Y ` axis you can convert the right side to ` ( A. ` x1 ` A. ` y1 ` A. ` y2 ` ( ( ` x1 ` f ` y1 ` /\ ` x1 ` f ` y2 ` ) -> ` y1 ` = ` y2 ` ) /\ Rel F ) ` . (Contributed by NM, 29-Dec-1996.)
blocks.origin:
thm dffunALTV3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wb(wfunALTV(c0), wa(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wrel(c0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wfunALTV(c0), wa(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wrel(c0)), wa(wss(ccoss(c0), cid), wrel(c0)))
  dffunALTV2(c0)
  anbi1i(wss(ccoss(c0), cid), wrel(c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  cossssid3(s0, s1, s2, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dffunALTV3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (FunALTV(c0)‚Üî(‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s0[c0]s2)‚Üí s1 = s2))))‚àß Rel(c0)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  bitri(FunALTV(c0), (‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s0[c0]s2)‚Üí s1 = s2))))‚àß Rel(c0)), (, ~(c0)‚äÜ = ‚àß Rel(c0)))
  dffunALTV2(c0)
  anbi1i(, ~(c0)‚äÜ =, Rel(c0), ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s0[c0]s2)‚Üí s1 = s2)))))
  cossssid3(s0, s1, s2, c0)
}

blocks.origin:
thm elfunsALTV3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfunsALTV), wa(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wcel(c0, crels)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, cfunsALTV), wa(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wcel(c0, crels)), wa(wcel(ccoss(c0), ccnvrefrels), wcel(c0, crels)))
  elfunsALTV(c0)
  pm5.32ri(wcel(ccoss(c0), ccnvrefrels), wcel(c0, crels), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  syl6rbbr(wcel(c0, crels), wcel(ccoss(c0), ccnvrefrels), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wa(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wcel(ccoss(c0), crels)))
  biantrud(wcel(c0, crels), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wcel(ccoss(c0), crels))
  cosselrels(c0, crels)
  cosselcnvrefrels3(s0, s1, s2, c0)
}

thm elfunsALTV3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà FunsALTV ‚Üî(‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s0[c0]s2)‚Üí s1 = s2))))‚àß c0 ‚àà Rels))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
} = {

  elfunsALTV(c0)

  syl6rbbr(c0 ‚àà Rels, , ~(c0)‚àà CnvRefRels, ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s0[c0]s2)‚Üí s1 = s2)))), (‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s0[c0]s2)‚Üí s1 = s2))))‚àß, ~(c0)‚àà Rels))
  biantrud(c0 ‚àà Rels, ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s0[c0]s2)‚Üí s1 = s2)))), , ~(c0)‚àà Rels)
  cosselrels(c0, crels)
  cosselcnvrefrels3(s0, s1, s2, c0)
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà FunsALTV ‚Üî(‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÉ*(s1, s0[c0]s1))‚àß c0 ‚àà Rels))

  biantrud(c0 ‚àà Rels, ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÉ*(s1, s0[c0]s1)), , ~(c0)‚àà Rels)
  cosselrels(c0, crels)
  cosselcnvrefrels4(s0, s1, c0)
}

blocks.name: elfunsALTV5
blocks.content: Elementhood in the class of functions. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 5-Sep-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm elfunsALTV5(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfunsALTV), wa(wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cec(cv(s0), ccnv(c0)), cec(cv(s1), ccnv(c0))), emptycls)))), wcel(c0, crels)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, cfunsALTV), wa(wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cec(cv(s0), ccnv(c0)), cec(cv(s1), ccnv(c0))), emptycls)))), wcel(c0, crels)), wa(wcel(ccoss(c0), ccnvrefrels), wcel(c0, crels)))
  elfunsALTV(c0)
  pm5.32ri(wcel(ccoss(c0), ccnvrefrels), wcel(c0, crels), wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cec(cv(s0), ccnv(c0)), cec(cv(s1), ccnv(c0))), emptycls)))))
  syl6rbbr(wcel(c0, crels), wcel(ccoss(c0), ccnvrefrels), wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cec(cv(s0), ccnv(c0)), cec(cv(s1), ccnv(c0))), emptycls)))), wa(wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cec(cv(s0), ccnv(c0)), cec(cv(s1), ccnv(c0))), emptycls)))), wcel(ccoss(c0), crels)))
  biantrud(wcel(c0, crels), wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cec(cv(s0), ccnv(c0)), cec(cv(s1), ccnv(c0))), emptycls)))), wcel(ccoss(c0), crels))
  cosselrels(c0, crels)
  cosselcnvrefrels5(s0, s1, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elfunsALTV5(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà FunsALTV ‚Üî(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0),(s0 = s1 ‚à®([s0]`' c0 ‚ãÇ[s1]`' c0)= ‚àÖ)))‚àß c0 ‚àà Rels))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ‚àà FunsALTV, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0),(s0 = s1 ‚à®([s0]`' c0 ‚ãÇ[s1]`' c0)= ‚àÖ)))‚àß c0 ‚àà Rels), (, ~(c0)‚àà CnvRefRels ‚àß c0 ‚àà Rels))
  elfunsALTV(c0)
  pm5.32ri(, ~(c0)‚àà CnvRefRels, c0 ‚àà Rels, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0),(s0 = s1 ‚à®([s0]`' c0 ‚ãÇ[s1]`' c0)= ‚àÖ))))
  syl6rbbr(c0 ‚àà Rels, , ~(c0)‚àà CnvRefRels, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0),(s0 = s1 ‚à®([s0]`' c0 ‚ãÇ[s1]`' c0)= ‚àÖ))), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0),(s0 = s1 ‚à®([s0]`' c0 ‚ãÇ[s1]`' c0)= ‚àÖ)))‚àß, ~(c0)‚àà Rels))
  biantrud(c0 ‚àà Rels, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ran(c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0),(s0 = s1 ‚à®([s0]`' c0 ‚ãÇ[s1]`' c0)= ‚àÖ))), , ~(c0)‚àà Rels)
  cosselrels(c0, crels)
  cosselcnvrefrels5(s0, s1, c0)
}

blocks.name: elfunsALTVfunALTV
blocks.content: The element of the class of functions and the function predicate are the same when ` F ` is a set. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 26-Jul-2021.)

blocks.name: funALTVfun
blocks.content: Our definition of the function predicate ~ df-funALTV (based on a more general, converse reflexive, relation) and the original definition of function in set.mm ~ df-fun , are always the same and interchangeable. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 27-Jul-2021.)

blocks.name: funALTVss
blocks.content: Subclass theorem for function. (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-1994.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jun-2014.) (Revised by Peter Mazsa, 22-Sep-2021.)

blocks.name: funALTVeq
blocks.content: Equality theorem for function predicate. (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: funALTVeqi
blocks.content: Equality inference for the function predicate. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: funALTVeqd
blocks.content: Equality deduction for the function predicate. (Contributed by NM, 23-Feb-2013.)
